name: src/AuthClient.js
AuthClient
isValidUrl
description:
A method to test id a given url contains the information
needed to extract or generate a token

unknown.tagValue: {bool} indicates it the url is valid

params.name: url
params.description: The url containing the server informations

return.description: indicates it the url is valid

name: getLoginUrl
description: Generate a login url which the application should show to the user
examples:
const url = await authClient.getLoginUrl();
location.href = url;

unknown.tagValue: {string} The resulting url which should be shown to the user

params.name: options
params.description:
the options combined which will be combined
                         with the client's global options

return.description: The resulting url which should be shown to the user

name: exchangeToken
description: Transform a redirect url into a valid token

params.name: url
params.description: The url containing the server informations

params.name: options
params.description:
the options combined which will be combined
                         with the client's global options

name: getToken
description:
Generates a new token, either using the refreshToken or the username
and password supplied to options

params.name: options
params.description:
the options combined which will be combined
                         with the client's global options

name: src/Crypto.js
src/Store.js
./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "authenticatornator",
  "version": "0.0.0-development",
  "main": "lib/index.js",
  "src": "src/index.js",
  "license": "MIT",
  "scripts": {
    "demo": "parcel -p 3000 -d docs/demo --public-url \"/authclient/demo/\" demo/index.html",
    "test:lint": "eslint src",
    "test:jest": "jest",
    "test": "npm run test:lint && npm run test:jest",
    "build": "babel src -d lib -s",
    "build:docs": "esdoc",
    "bundle": "webpack",
    "prepare": "npm run build && npm run bundle",
    "publish:docs": "npm run build:docs && gh-pages -d docs",
    "semantic-release": "semantic-release",
    "coverage": "npm run test:jest && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls",
    "travis-deploy-once": "travis-deploy-once"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-cli": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-core": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-eslint": "^8.2.1",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.2",
    "babel-plugin-module-resolver": "^3.0.0",
    "babel-plugin-transform-flow-strip-types": "^6.22.0",
    "babel-plugin-transform-private": "^0.1.3",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.6.1",
    "babel-preset-stage-1": "^6.24.1",
    "coveralls": "^3.0.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-babel-plugin": "^1.0.1",
    "esdoc-brand-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-custom-theme": "^1.4.2",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-importpath-plugin": "^1.0.1",
    "esdoc-publish-html-plugin": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^4.16.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb": "^16.1.0",
    "eslint-import-resolver-babel-module": "^4.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-flowtype": "^2.42.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.8.0",
    "eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y": "^6.0.3",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.6.0",
    "gh-pages": "^1.1.0 ",
    "husky": "^0.14.3",
    "jest": "^22.1.4",
    "parcel-bundler": "^1.6.2",
    "semantic-release": "^15.0.3",
    "semantic-release-cli": "^3.6.4",
    "travis-deploy-once": "^4.4.0",
    "uglifyjs-webpack-plugin": "^1.2.3",
    "webpack": "^3.10.0"
  },
  "jest": {
    "coverageDirectory": "./coverage",
    "coverageReporters": [
      "json",
      "lcov",
      "text",
      "html"
    ],
    "collectCoverage": true,
    "roots": [
      "./src"
    ],
    "testMatch": [
      "**/?(*.)(spec|test).js?(x)"
    ]
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "axios": "^0.18.0"
  },
  "release": {
    "branch": "master"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/morten-olsen/authclient.git"
  }
}
name: package.json
